column4: I am trying to understand what Metacity exactly is - do I understand correctly that it's nothing more than a desktop theme manager ?
Metacity (pronounced to rhyme with "capacity" with the stress on the second syllable[1] ) is a compositing window manager used by default in the GNOME desktop environment.[2]
yes I've read that on several websites a few minutes ago - is it just a desktop theme manager then :)
I am trying to make sense of metacity, compiz and so on
